job_type: Software Development: Building a customer relationship management (CRM) system.
sow_title: Statement of Work: CRM System Development
introduction: This Statement of Work (SOW) outlines the agreement between [Client Company Name] and [Vendor Company Name] for the development of a custom Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system. This system will aim to streamline sales processes, improve customer engagement, and enhance data management.
objectives: Develop a fully functional CRM system with core modules for contact management, lead tracking, opportunity management, and reporting.
Ensure seamless integration with existing [mention existing systems, e.g., email platform, marketing automation tool].
Provide a user-friendly interface accessible via web and mobile devices.
Deliver comprehensive training documentation and initial user training sessions.
Adhere to agreed-upon timelines and budget constraints.
scope_of_work: Front-end and back-end development of all core modules.
Creation of user manuals and training materials.
deliverables: Fully functional CRM system (web and mobile access).
User acceptance testing (UAT) test scripts and results.
acceptance_criteria: All core modules function according to the agreed-upon specifications.
Successful integration with [mention existing systems] without errors.
System passes all defined user acceptance testing scenarios.
User interface is intuitive and meets accessibility standards.
All deliverables listed in this SOW are provided and approved by the client.
reporting_communication: Weekly progress reports will be provided via email, including updates on completed tasks, upcoming milestones, and any potential risks or issues. Bi-weekly status meetings will be held virtually.
assumptions: Client will provide timely feedback and approvals.
Access to necessary client systems and personnel will be granted as required.
The scope of work is clearly defined and any changes will be subject to a formal change request process.
Client's existing infrastructure meets the minimum requirements for the CRM system.
Standard business hours will be observed for communication and support.
exclusions: Ongoing system maintenance and support beyond the initial deployment phase.
Customization or development of features not explicitly mentioned in the scope of work.
Data migration from legacy systems (unless specified in a separate agreement).
